sentences.en: Almost in the same instant it dropped on to the board with a clatter.
sentences.cn: 他刚拣起,那棋子就啪的掉在棋盘上了.

sentences.en: Don't clatter those dishes about, you'll break them.
sentences.cn: 不要把那些碟子碰得那么响, 你会把它们打碎的.

sentences.en: Don't clatter your knives and forks.
Don't clatter your knives andforks while eating.
sentences.cn: 吃东西的时候不要把刀叉弄得丁当作响.

sentences.en: From somewhere distant he heard the clatter of a typewriter.
sentences.cn: 他听见从远处什么地方传来打字机的嗒嗒声。

sentences.en: I heard a clatter in the passage of the inn.
sentences.cn: 我听到旅馆走廊里一阵嘈杂.

sentences.en: It dropped onto the board with a clatter.
sentences.cn: 那东西啪地掉在棋盘上.

sentences.en: She went downstairs with a cheerful clatter, singing.
sentences.cn: 她迈着轻快的脚步, 唱着歌下楼去了.

sentences.en: The audience stopped their clatter when the performance started.
sentences.cn: 演出开始时,观众停止喧哗.

sentences.en: The bird took fright and fled with a clatter of wings.
sentences.cn: 鸟儿吃了一惊,振翅飞了开去.

sentences.en: The clatter of mahjong - tiles came from the dining - room next door.
sentences.cn: 牌声从隔壁大餐间传来.

sentences.en: The dishes and bowls slid together with a clatter.
sentences.cn: 碟子碗碰得丁丁当当的.

sentences.en: The sounds of cooking and the clatter of dishes came from the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 烧饭声和碗碟的撞击声从厨房传来.

sentences.en: The tray slipped and clattered to the floor.
sentences.cn: 盘子滑落下来，啪啦一声掉在地上。

sentences.en: They heard a clatter below stairs.
sentences.cn: 他们听到楼下响起一阵哐哐啷啷的声音.

sentences.en: Valve clatter is of course eliminated along with the valves.
sentences.cn: 阀门的咕噔咕噔的声音自然也与阀门一起被消除掉了.

trans.tran_cn: 发出哗啦声；喧闹的谈笑
trans.tran_en: if heavy hard objects clatter, or if you clatter them, they make a loud unpleasant noise

trans.tran_cn: 发出咔哒声，嘁嘁喳喳地说笑，使卡搭卡搭的响
